content.text: Welcome to the DroneAid Assembly Guide! This interactive guide will walk you through the complete assembly process of your drone step by step.
Before you begin, please ensure you have all the necessary components and tools ready. This guide is designed to be followed sequentially, so please complete each step before moving to the next.
Estimated assembly time: 2-3 hours for first-time builders, 1-2 hours for experienced builders.

ordered_list: Prepare your workspace with good lighting
Follow each step carefully and check your work

text: Safety is our top priority. Always work in a well-ventilated area when soldering, and ensure your battery is disconnected during assembly.
If you encounter any issues or have questions, refer to the troubleshooting section at the end of this guide.
Take your time and enjoy the building process. Building your own drone is a rewarding experience!
